document.full_text: when the chicago bulls forward carlos boozer said his team would be up against two great players from miami in the nba playoffs few had any doubt about which one of the heat's 'big three' he was omitting.
document.title: bookish bosh let's his points do the talking
lines_and_colors: when the chicago bulls forward carlos boozer said his team would be up against two great players from miami in the nba playoffs few had any doubt about which one of the heat's 'big three' he was omitting.
